Reactions

?

On this page, different types of metabolisms and reaction related data is displayed.

The Import, Export and Conversion are the frequencies of those reactions in the entire population.

The metabolic counts/types are of the 5 most abundant ones.


Trophic types:
Facultative mixotroph Can produce BBs (building blocks) from influxed metabolites, but also solely from secondary (non-influxed) metabolites.
Autotroph Can only produce BBs from influxed molecules.
Heterotroph Can only produce BBs from secondary molecules.
Obligate mixotroph Everything else (i.e. you need both influxed and secondary metabolites to make BBs)


(Drag to zoom, and double-click to zoom out. Shift-drag to pan. Use the field in the bottom-left to set a rolling average.)
